nft.title: Select an NFT
nft.noNFTs: No NFTs found for this address.

selected.title: Selected NFT
selected.subtitle: Are you sure you want to use this NFT?

upload.title: Upload Avatar
upload.subtitle: You need to sign a message to upload an avatar. This won't cost anything.

description.label: Short Bio
description.placeholder: I'm a yield farmer from rural Tennessee.

resumable.title: Resumable transaction
resumable.subtitle: You have previously started a transaction. Click resume to continue.

migrate.title: Migrate resolver
migrate.subtitle: You have migrated your profile but haven't updated your resolver. Click upgrade to update to the latest resolver.

noResolver.title: No resolver assigned
noResolver.subtitle: You need to set a resolver to edit your profile.

oldRegistry.title: Your registry is out of date
oldRegistry.subtitle: Migration to the new registry is not available, but you can still migrate this name in the old app.

default.title: Your resolver is out of date
default.subtitle: Profile editing is disabled until you update your resolver.

editResolver.title: Edit Resolver
editResolver.latestMessage: You are on the latest resolver

extendNames.bannerMsg: Extending for multiple years will save money on network costs by avoiding yearly transactions.

transferProfile.title: Transfer Profile
transferProfile.message1: Before upgrading, you can transfer your current profile if you'd like, otherwise it will be reset when you upgrade.
transferProfile.message2: Would you like to transfer your current profile?

extendNames.warning: Extending this name will not give you ownership of it

migrateAndUpdateResolver.title: The edits you want to save to your profile require that you upgrade your resolver.
migrateAndUpdateResolver.warning: Note that if you cancel this at any point your changes will not be saved.
